peeragogical-action-review.title: Peeragogy Progress PAR 2 (2013)
peeragogical-action-review.intention-review: Could we fund our MOOC on Kickstarter rather than with a grant?
peeragogical-action-review.what-happened: We juggle the numbers, and get feedback from Kio Stark, who successfully crowdfunded her book, “Don’t Go Back to School” (2013). She cautions: “on Kickstarter—if people don’t immediately get what it is, they’re not likely to stick around long enough for the explanation.”
peeragogical-action-review.what-happened-perspectives: One of our collaborators suggests that we include time donations alongside monetary donations. We juggle the numbers some more.
peeragogical-action-review.learnings-changes: We have started to describe a value proposition.
peeragogical-action-review.what-else-should-change-going-forward: Kio Stark tells us Kickstarter is a full-time job: proceed with caution.
